titleInfo.title: (PS) Louie v. Ericson et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER signed by Magistrate Judge Kendall J. Newman on 4/2/12 ORDERING all parties to show cause in writing, on or before 4/26/12, why he or she should not be sanctioned for failing to timely file a Status Report in anticipation of the status converence set for 4/5/12 and RESETTING the Status Conference to 5/10/12 at 10:00 a.m. in Courtroom 25 (KJN) before Magistrate Judge Kendall J. Newman. On or before 5/3/12, the parties shall file a Joint Status Report addressing the specific issues listed in the undersigned's order of 11/8/11, the parties' respective Consent/Decline to Jurisdiction of U.S. Magistrate Judge forms as well as any other issues the parties deem pertinent. Show Cause Response due by 4/26/2012. (Meuleman, A)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 2:11-cv-00886; (PS) Louie v. Ericson et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court Eastern District of California
extension.docketText: ORDER signed by Magistrate Judge Kendall J. Newman on 4/2/12 ORDERING all parties to show cause in writing, on or before 4/26/12, why he or she should not be sanctioned for failing to timely file a Status Report in anticipation of the status converence set for 4/5/12 and RESETTING the Status Conference to 5/10/12 at 10:00 a.m. in Courtroom 25 (KJN) before Magistrate Judge Kendall J. Newman. On or before 5/3/12, the parties shall file a Joint Status Report addressing the specific issues listed in the undersigned's order of 11/8/11, the parties' respective Consent/Decline to Jurisdiction of U.S. Magistrate Judge forms as well as any other issues the parties deem pertinent. Show Cause Response due by 4/26/2012. (Meuleman, A)

titleInfo.title: (PS) Louie v. Ericson et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER signed by Magistrate Judge Kendall J. Newman on 5/16/12 ORDERING that the claims asserted against Wh Shau-Linn and Wh Can Xiang are severed from this action; the Clerk is directed to open a new civil action and file this order and the first event in the newly opened action; the Clerk is further directed to assign US District Judge John A. Mendez and US Magistrate Judge Kendall J. Newman to the new action; pltf's consent filed in this case shall be effective in the new action; first amended complaint due within 14 days in the new action; pltf shall serve dfts with summons, amended complaint and related documents within 30 days. Joint status report due within 30 days in this action (11-cv-0886 KJN). (Manzer, C)

titleInfo.title: (PS) Louie v. Ericson et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER signed by Magistrate Judge Kendall J. Newman on 6/11/2012. Since a 31 Notice of Settlement has been filed, parties shall file dispositional documents w/in 60 days of date of this Order. All previously scheduled date and deadlines in case are VACATED. (Marciel, M)

titleInfo.title: (PS) Louie v. Ericson et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER signed by Magistrate Judge Kendall J. Newman on 1/3/2013 ORDERING on or before 2/3/2013, the parties shall file a joint status report providing an update regarding the status of the bankruptcy matter, the bankruptcy court's determination regarding the Motion to Compromise referenced in 33 Fukushima's filing on 7/31/2012, the status of the settlement in this case, and the anticipated filing date of dispositional documents; failure to comply with this Order may be grounds for imposition of sanctions.(Waggoner, D)

titleInfo.title: (PS) Louie v. Ericson et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER signed by Magistrate Judge Kendall J. Newman on 1/29/13 APPROVING and ORDERING 35 Stipulation of Dismissal. The Clerk of the Court is DIRECTED to vacate all future dates and to CLOSE this case. CASE CLOSED. (Meuleman, A)
